entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023
